categories: Category:Sith Lords of the reconstituted Sith Empire

nodes.text: Rhexa was a male Sith Lord of the Sith species stationed on Quesh around 3642 BBY, when he was killed.

Rhexa appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as a Champion boss on Quesh. He is not directly involved in any quests, but can be killed for loot and as part of the achievement. This article assumes 100% game completion, which means he was killed.
